cause.description:
Everyone has a right to an education outside Of community colleges.If you have been to Mcdonalds or any fast food restaurant in the last month you can afford $5.00 dollars. Just imagine if 1 million people donated 5 bucks. thats alot of school.
1. Students have the right to an education atleast I think so.
cause.mission: Help middle class students get to college.
cause.name: Help the middle class get to college scholarship.
